ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Position adjustments for 'ggplot2' to implement "visualize as you randomize" principles, which can be especially useful when plotting experimental data.
Position adjustments for 'ggplot2' to implement "visualize as you randomize" principles, which can be especially useful when plotting experimental data.

name: r-vayr
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '1.0.0' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-vayr
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/vayr_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/vayr/vayr_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 9b61342f327d5f5fcb712323d5b7b6361ebf7ed84f3f56395c9eed2d05b1a594

build:
  number: 1
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/
  missing_dso_whitelist:
    - '*/R.dll'        # [win]
    - '*/Rblas.dll'    # [win]
    - '*/Rlapack.dll'  # [win]

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-ggplot2 >=3.0.0
    - r-packcircles >=0.3.7
    - r-withr >=2.1.1
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-ggplot2 >=3.0.0
    - r-packcircles >=0.3.7
    - r-withr >=2.1.1

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('vayr')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('vayr')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://alexandercoppock.com/vayr/index.html
  license: GPL-2.0-only
  summary: Position adjustments for 'ggplot2' to implement "visualize as you randomize" principles,
    which can be especially useful when plotting experimental data.
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2'
    - LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - thewchan

# Package: vayr
# Title: Extensions for 'ggplot2' to Visualize as You Randomize
# Version: 1.0.0
# Authors@R: c(person("Alexander", "Coppock", , "acoppock@gmail.com", role = c("aut", "cre", "cph"), comment = c(ORCID = "0000-0002-5733-2386")), person("Elias", "Hyde", , "eliasworrallhyde@gmail.com", role = "ctb"))
# Description: Position adjustments for 'ggplot2' to implement "visualize as you randomize" principles, which can be especially useful when plotting experimental data.
# License: GPL-2 | file LICENSE
# URL: https://alexandercoppock.com/vayr/index.html
# Depends: R (>= 4.1.0)
# Imports: ggplot2 (>= 3.0.0), packcircles (>= 0.3.7), withr (>= 2.1.1)
# Suggests: dplyr, estimatr, knitr, patchwork, randomizr, rmarkdown, sessioninfo, testthat, tibble, tidyverse
# VignetteBuilder: knitr
# Encoding: UTF-8
# LazyData: true
# RoxygenNote: 7.3.2
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2025-04-10 18:06:23 UTC; ac2595
# Author: Alexander Coppock [aut, cre, cph] (<https://orcid.org/0000-0002-5733-2386>), Elias Hyde [ctb]
# Maintainer: Alexander Coppock <acoppock@gmail.com>
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2025-04-15 20:10:05 UTC
